Event reminder {{ eventDate }}.description: Subject for the event reminder email

event_reminder_1.message: This is a reminder that you have registered for an upcoming event.
event_reminder_1.description: First paragraph of the event reminder email

event_reminder_2.description: Information about the event host follows this paragraph

event_reminder_3.message: Get ready to make, learn and have fun! Don't forget to tweet using @Webmaker on Twitter and tell us how it goes (and show us what you make).
event_reminder_3.description: Third paragraph of the event reminder email
